snippet.title: Brutal Grounds - Pre-Alpha Game-play Teaser
snippet.description:
http://BrutalGrounds.com Brutal Grounds is an indie game being developed by AGOG Entertainment. All game play is pre-Alpha. Several assets, effects, are still in development.

About the game: Brutal Grounds is a fast-paced competitive shooter inspired by games like Doom and Unreal Tournament combined with a modern eSports focused design of games like Rocket League. Players equip their Brute (a war-ball) with various weapons and abilities and take to the arena to battle it out in classic game modes like Capture the Flag, Control, Deathmatch, and more.

Follow the development at http://twitter.com/brutalgrounds
